canUserMintCompanion(uint256,address).details: Check if user can mint companion for an SBT

returns._0: bool True if can mint companion

getUpgradeFee().details: Get upgrade fee from premium contract

returns._0: bytes32[] Array of premium upgrade attestation IDs

hasUserAttendedEvent(address,bytes32).details: Check if user attended a specific event

returns._0: bool True if user attended the event
bool True if event is registered

mintCompanionWithAttestation(uint256,add.details: Mint Premium companion for SBT with automatic attestation creation

params._organizer: The organizer address for fee distribution
params._sbtId: The SBT ID to mint companion for

mintSBTWithAttestation(address,string,by.details: UPDATED: Mint SBT with signature from backend + automatic attestation

params._signature: The signature from backend issuer (NEW PARAMETER)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

mintSBTWithAttestation(address,string,by.notice: PUBLIC FUNCTION - Anyone can call with valid signatureFrontend calls /verify-code API  Gets signature  Calls this function
